name: Tutorial
description:
I wrote a Bitsy tutorial (http://clairemorleyart.com/a-bitsy-tutorial), this is the game I made while writing it. I soon found that I was really just writing about how much I love using the tool to make small games.

Game data available here: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_wDEC2vxK3teUJOckswV2ZvQmc
